#summary source media attribute
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute,from-whatwg

== Usage ==

The source media attribute gives the intended media type of the media resource, to help the user agent determine if this media resource is useful to the user before fetching it.

== Values ==

The source media attribute must be a valid [http://www.whatwg.org/specs/web-apps/current-work/multipage/infrastructure.html#mq media query].

== Elements ==

You can use the `media` attribute on the following elements:

  * [SourceElement <source>]

== Browser compatibility ==

|| *Test* || *IE8* || *IE7* || *FF3* || *FF2* || *Saf3* ||
